I recently read 'The Dominance Tournament Method of Monitoring
Progress in =
Coevolution'
(http://scholar.google.com/url?sa=3DU&q=3Dhttp://www.cs.utexas=
.edu/users/nn/downloads/papers/stanley.geccows02.pdf)
and I find Dominance =
Tournaments to be a very interesting concept for
monitoring coevolutionary =
progress. I was wondering though if anyone
had any thoughts on how to exten=
d this concept to n-player, possibly
intransitive games?

Apologies since t=
his isn't strictly NEAT-related, but since Ken is
first author of the paper=
 and it uses NEAT, I figured this might be an
appropriate forum.
